items.title: ‘Trench Talk' debut: All Ears with JP Finlay
items.summary: Trench Talk debuts on “All Ears with JP Finlay!” JP breaks down the big moves on the Commanders’ offensive and defensive lines, plus we head from the field to the ice and pay tribute to the NHL’s new goal king, Alex Ovechkin.

items.title: Inside the NFL Annual Meeting: All Ears with JP Finlay
items.summary: Team Insider JP Finlay takes you to the NFL Annual Meeting in Florida. Hear from Commanders GM Adam Peters and head coach Dan Quinn on the team’s recent moves and Terry McLaurin’s future. Plus, we’re talking “Tush Push!”

items.title: What Deebo Samuel brings to the Commanders: All Ears with JP Finlay
items.summary:
On this week’s All Ears with JP Finlay, hear from new wide receiver Deebo Samuel on what he brings to the Commanders, and why he’s quite familiar with Jayden Daniels.
Plus, take a trip around the NFC East as we check in our NBC insiders on the offseason moves from the Eagles, Cowboys and Giants.

items.excerpt:
On this week’s All Ears with JP Finlay, hear from new wide receiver Deebo Samuel on what he brings to the Commanders, and why he’s quite familiar with Jayden Daniels.
Plus, take a trip around the NFC East as we check in our NBC insiders on the offseason moves from the Eagles, Cowboys and Giants.
items.video_hero_text:
On this week’s All Ears with JP Finlay, hear from new wide receiver Deebo Samuel on what he brings to the Commanders, and why he’s quite familiar with Jayden Daniels.
Plus, take a trip around the NFC East as we check in our NBC insiders on the offseason moves from the Eagles, Cowboys and Giants.

items.title: Commanders offseason heats up: All Ears with JP Finlay
items.summary:
The Commanders’ offseason is heating up!
Hear from the newest Commanders like Laremy Tunsil on why they joined the Burgundy and Gold, plus players who re-signed, like Marcus Mariota. And March Madness hits All Ears as JP Finlay breaks down the free agency moves, bracket style!

items.excerpt:
The Commanders’ offseason is heating up!
Hear from the newest Commanders like Laremy Tunsil on why they joined the Burgundy and Gold, plus players who re-signed, like Marcus Mariota. And March Madness hits All Ears as JP Finlay breaks down the free agency moves, bracket style!
items.video_hero_text:
The Commanders’ offseason is heating up!
Hear from the newest Commanders like Laremy Tunsil on why they joined the Burgundy and Gold, plus players who re-signed, like Marcus Mariota. And March Madness hits All Ears as JP Finlay breaks down the free agency moves, bracket style!

items.title: New League Year, new Commanders: All Ears with JP Finlay
items.summary: As the new League Year begins, Team Insider JP Finlay breaks down the new Commanders team, including new and returning players.

items.title: Commanders' Dan Quinn on skill player needs: All Ears with JP Finlay
items.summary: Washington Commanders coach Dan Quinn answers questions about skill player needs. Team insider JP Finlay explains. Also on All Ears: What They’re Saying, What You Missed and the Mailbag.

items.title: Myles Garrett on the Commanders?: All Ears with JP Finlay
items.summary: Cleveland Browns Player Myles Garrett was asked if he would ever consider joining the Washington Commanders. Team Insider JP Finlay explains. Also on All Ears: What They’re Saying, What You Missed and the Mailbag.

items.excerpt: Cleveland Browns Player Myles Garrett was asked if he would ever consider joining the Washington Commanders. Team Insider JP Finlay explains. Also on All Ears: What They’re Saying, What You Missed and the Mailbag.

items.summary: Team Insider JP Finlay reports live from New Orleans ahead of the Super Bowl. Also on All Ears: What You Missed and The Weekend Line.

items.excerpt: Team Insider JP Finlay reports live from New Orleans ahead of the Super Bowl. Also on All Ears: What You Missed and The Weekend Line.
items.video_hero_text: Team Insider JP Finlay reports live from New Orleans ahead of the Super Bowl. Also on All Ears: What You Missed and The Weekend Line.

items.title: The Commanders' incredible season and 4 next steps: All Ears with JP Finlay
items.summary: The Commanders’ incredible season came to an end, but diehard fans and a new generation are excited for the team’s future. Team Insider JP Finlay shares the latest from Dan Quinn, Adam Peters, Jayden Daniels and others, and looks at what’s next.

items.excerpt: Team Insider JP Finlay reports live from Philadelphia with News4’s Doug Kammerer counting down to the NFC Championship game.
items.video_hero_text: Team Insider JP Finlay reports live from Philadelphia with News4’s Doug Kammerer counting down to the NFC Championship game.

items.title: NFC championship game, here come the Commanders: All Ears with JP Finlay
items.summary: The Washington Commanders are on their way to the NFC championship game against the Philidelphia Eagles. Team Insider JP Finlay has the latest. Also on All Ears: one-on-one with former Washington star Vernon Davis.

items.excerpt: The Washington Commanders are on their way to the NFC championship game against the Philidelphia Eagles. Team Insider JP Finlay has the latest. Also on All Ears: one-on-one with former Washington star Vernon Davis.
items.video_hero_text: The Washington Commanders are on their way to the NFC championship game against the Philidelphia Eagles. Team Insider JP Finlay has the latest. Also on All Ears: one-on-one with former Washington star Vernon Davis.

items.title: Commanders get ready to face the Lions: All Ears with JP Finlay
items.summary: The Washington Commanders gear up to face the Detroit Lions. Team Insider JP Finlay reports. Also on All Ears: Jayden Daniels on why he doesn’t get nervous in big games.

items.title: Commanders prep for wild card game vs. Buccaneers: All Ears with JP Finlay
items.summary: The Washington Commanders are gearing up to face the Tampa Bay Buccaneers. Team Insider JP Finlay has the details. Also on All Ears: 4 Nuggets to Know, the Mailbag and the Weekend Line.

items.title: What to watch as Commanders finish regular season, head to playoffs: All Ears with JP Finlay
items.summary: For the Commanders, it’s definitely the new year, with 11 wins for the first time since 1991. As they head to the playoffs, hear from Dan Quinn, Jayden Daniels and Terry McLaurin. Plus, JP goes 1-on-1 with tight ends coach David Raih.

items.title: Commanders face huge test in Falcons matchup on Sunday Night Football: All Ears with JP Finlay
items.summary: Jayden Daniels is growing as a leader every week and now they’re looking at the playoffs as they take on the Atlanta Falcons. JP Finlay sizes up the opportunities and challenges. Plus, NBC’s Mike Tirico chats about the big Sunday night matchup and more.

items.excerpt: Washington Commanders Quarterback Jayden Daniels talks about next week’s game against the Philadelphia Eagles. Team Insider JP Finlay explains. Also on All Ears: What They’re Saying, What You Missed
items.video_hero_text: Washington Commanders Quarterback Jayden Daniels talks about next week’s game against the Philadelphia Eagles. Team Insider JP Finlay explains. Also on All Ears: What They’re Saying, What You Missed

items.title: Commanders' Noah Brown likely out for the year: All Ears with JP Finlay
items.summary: Washington Commanders receivers speak on the loss of Noah Brown for the year. Team Insider JP Finlay reports. Also on All Ears: What They’re Saying, What You Missed and 4 Nuggets to Know.

items.excerpt: Washington Commanders receivers speak on the loss of Noah Brown for the year. Team Insider JP Finlay reports. Also on All Ears: What They’re Saying, What You Missed and 4 Nuggets to Know.

items.title: Commanders' Quinn on Seibert injury and kickoff strategy: All Ears with JP Finlay
items.summary: Washington Commanders Coach Dan Quinn talks about Kicker Austin Seibert’s injury and about their kickoff strategy. Team Insider JP Finlay reports. Also on All Ears: Commanders players give their takes on Thanksgiving food.

items.excerpt: Washington Commanders Coach Dan Quinn talks about Kicker Austin Seibert’s injury and about their kickoff strategy. Team Insider JP Finlay reports. Also on All Ears: Commanders players give their takes on Thanksgiving food.
